title: Forgot account Username, but I know the Summoner Name.
body: I forgot the Username and e-mail, but I know the Summoner name and Password. Any idea what to do?

replies.body: Submit a support ticket and see if they can help you recover your account. Just be aware that it likely won't be easy to do, because Riot has to make sure that people can't steal other accounts using the same set of information you have.

I just want to build on Zielmann's comment here (which is an awesome response).  The best method to recover your account is to write a ticket to Player Support, which you can find here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new

Due to account information being sensitive, we will require you to answer a few more questions simply to verify yourself as the original owner of the account.  Once done however, we can resolve the issue for you!
